docs.lead_paragraph: Readers respond to David Brooks's Mar. 1 column, "A Critique of Pure Reason."
docs.abstract: Readers respond to David Brooks's Mar. 1 column, "A Critique of Pure Reason." Helen Carvell, Austin, Tex.: You are right about early attachments being a firm basis for venturing into schools, but what about health? What about the child who can't hear because his earache wasn't treated, the kid who was up all night with [...]
